titleStmt.title: The testimony of the everlasting gospel witnessed through sufferings.
titleStmt.author: Hubberthorn, Richard, 1628-1662.
Atkinson, Christopher.
Lancaster, James, d. 1699.
Tofte, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Signed on p.3: A servant and a witnesse of Jesus in the bonds of the Gospel of Christ, and a prisoner in Norwich Castle, Richard Hubberthorn.
Includes charges by the mayor of Norwich, Thomas Tofte, against James Lancaster and Christopher Atkinson, Quakers imprisoned in Norwich, and their responses.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
